item.title: 通用汽车因电动汽车业务收缩将计提60亿美元减值损失
item.description: 通用汽车周四表示，将计提60亿美元费用以撤回部分电动汽车投资。这是最新一家因特朗普政府政策及需求疲软而缩减电动汽车业务的汽车公司。【原文：General Motors said on Thursday it would take a $6 billion charge to unwind some electric-vehicle investments, the latest car company to pull back from EVs in response to the Trump administration's policies and fading demand.】

item.title: 默克正洽谈收购生物技术公司Revolution Medicines，英国《金融时报》报道
item.description: 《金融时报》周四援引知情人士消息报道称，默克公司正就收购抗癌药物开发商Revolution Medicines展开谈判。【原文：Merck is in talks to buy cancer drug developer Revolution Medicines , the Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，雪佛龙正与竞争对手争夺委内瑞拉石油销售权
item.description: 行业消息人士周四透露，美国石油巨头雪佛龙、全球贸易商维托尔及其他石油贸易商、生产商和炼油商正竞相争取委内瑞拉原油出口合同，作为其与美国官员谈判获取与该国开展业务许可的一部分。【原文：U.S. oil major Chevron , global trading house Vitol and other oil traders, producers and refiners are competing to win deals for exports of Venezuelan crude as part of their talks with U.S. officials for licenses to do business with the country, industry sources said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称特朗普支持者、石油大亨哈里·萨金特正就委内瑞拉问题向美国提供建议
item.description: 据四位知情人士透露，亿万富翁能源企业家、共和党捐助者哈里·萨金特三世及其团队正就美国如何推动部分美国石油公司重返委内瑞拉向特朗普政府提供建议。【原文：Billionaire energy entrepreneur and Republican donor Harry Sargeant III and his team are advising the Trump administration on how the U.S. can engineer a return of some American oil companies to Venezuela, according to four sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英美资源集团与泰克资源公司合并案即将获得欧盟反垄断批准
item.description: 据欧盟委员会文件显示，伦敦上市矿业公司英美资源集团与加拿大泰克资源公司的拟议合并案，在欧盟监管机构表示不存在竞争担忧后，正朝着获得欧洲反垄断批准的方向推进。【原文：The proposed merger of London-listed miner Anglo American and Canada's Teck Resources is heading for antitrust clearance in Europe after EU regulators signalled the absence of competition concerns, according to a European Commission filing.】

item.title: 嘉能可表示正就被力拓收购事宜进行初步谈判
item.description: Glencore said on Thursday it was in early talks to be acquried by Rio Tinto , , in a combination that would potentially create the world's largest mining company.

item.title: 美国财政部官员贝森特表示，里德尚未接受美联储最高职位的面试，任命决定可能在本月作出。
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周四表示，贝莱德首席债券投资经理里克·里德尚未接受美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的面试，以竞聘美联储主席一职。他补充称，预计提名结果将于本月晚些时候公布。【原文：BlackRock's chief bond investment manager, Rick Rieder, has not been interviewed yet by U.S. President Donald Trump for the Federal Reserve top job, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Thursday, adding that he expects the nominee to be announced later this month.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，欧盟数字法规改革中科技巨头免于严格监管
item.description: 知情人士周四透露，尽管电信公司呼吁加强监管，但谷歌母公司Alphabet、Meta Platforms、奈飞、微软和亚马逊在欧洲数字法规改革中不会面临严厉监管。【原文：Alphabet's Google , Meta Platforms , Netflix , Microsoft and Amazon will not face heavy-handed regulations in Europe's digital rule overhaul despite calls from telecoms companies, people with direct knowledge of the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国国会预算办公室预测美联储今年将小幅降息
item.description: 国会预算办公室周四预测，美联储今年可能进一步小幅降息以"应对劳动力市场的下行风险"。由于关税提高以及特朗普政府减税政策带来的需求增长，通胀率预计将持续远高于美联储2%的目标水平。【原文：The Federal Reserve will likely cut rates a little more this year to "address downside risks to the labor market," the Congressional Budget Office forecast on Thursday, with higher tariffs and increased demand from the Trump administration's tax cuts expected to keep inflation well above the Fed's 2% target.】

item.title: CrowdStrike以7.4亿美元收购身份安全初创公司SGNL，以应对人工智能威胁
item.description: CrowdStrike周四宣布将以7.4亿美元收购身份安全初创公司SGNL，旨在增强其网络安全工具，帮助客户应对人工智能驱动的威胁。【原文：CrowdStrike said on Thursday it would buy identity security startup SGNL in a deal valued at $740 million aiming to enhance its cybersecurity tools to help customers counter artificial intelligence-powered threats.】

item.title: 焦点：从奢侈品巨头到濒临崩溃：萨克斯百货重大并购赌局如何失败
item.description: 萨克斯百货与内曼·马库斯以27亿美元完成合并，旨在打造奢侈品百货领域的行业巨头，以应对来自线上零售商及布鲁明戴尔、诺德斯特龙等竞争对手的挑战。【原文：The $2.7-billion marriage of Saks and Neiman Marcus was meant to create a powerhouse in the world of luxury department stores, helping it fight competition from online players and rivals such as Bloomingdale's and Nordstrom.】

item.title: 巴西2025年鸡蛋出口量激增，得益于美国强劲需求
item.description: 巴西动物蛋白协会（ABPA）周四发布的数据显示，得益于美国强劲需求，2025年巴西鸡蛋出口量（含鲜蛋和加工蛋）创下40,894公吨的历史新高。【原文：Brazilian egg exports, including fresh and processed, hit a record 40,894 metric tons in 2025 on strong U.S. demand, according to data compiled by the Brazilian Association of Animal Protein (ABPA) on Thursday.】

item.title: 意大利隐私监管机构就深度伪造AI内容对Grok发出警告
item.description: 意大利数据保护机构周四警告人工智能工具用户及提供商——包括埃隆·马斯克的聊天机器人Grok——在未经被拍摄者同意的情况下，利用真实内容生成深度伪造图像存在风险。【原文：Italy's data protection authority on Thursday warned users and providers of artificial intelligence tools, including Elon Musk’s chatbot Grok, over the risk of generating deepfake images from real content without the consent of featured individuals.】

item.title: 特朗普瞄准美国国防行业股息与回购计划，数十亿美元利益悬而未决
item.description: 美国国防企业本周遭到总统唐纳德·特朗普的抨击，此前他承诺在这些企业加快生产之前，将阻止它们支付股息或回购股票。【原文：U.S. defense companies came under fire from President Donald Trump this week, after he pledged to block them from paying dividends or buying back shares until they accelerated production.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟部分最大投资者对派拉蒙收购要约意见不一
item.description: 华纳兄弟探索公司部分大股东对派拉蒙天空舞影业提高报价收购这家历史悠久的电影制片厂持不同意见，这为规模较小的媒体公司争取股东支持提供了机会。【原文：Some of Warner Bros Discovery's biggest investors are split on Paramount Skydance's sweetened offer for the storied movie studio owner, giving the smaller media company a fighting chance at winning over shareholders.】

item.title: 巴西联邦审计法院将裁定是否对Banco Master清算案文件进行审查
item.description: 巴西联邦审计法院（TCU）一名法官周四同意了中央银行的请求，将是否应审查该行与Banco Master清算相关的文件一事提交全体会议表决。【原文：A judge on Brazil's federal audit court (TCU) on Thursday agreed to a request from the central bank to submit for a plenary decision on whether the court should inspect central bank documents related to the liquidation of Banco Master.】

item.title: 联合国预测2026年全球经济增长率将降至2.7%
item.description: 联合国周四发布的一份报告显示，全球经济增长率预计将从去年的2.8%降至2026年的2.7%，随后在2027年回升至2.9%。这一增速仍低于2010至2019年间疫情前的年均增长率3.2%。【原文：Global economic growth is forecast to decline to 2.7% in 2026 from 2.8% last year before increasing to 2.9% in 2027 - still down from the pre-pandemic average of 3.2% between 2010 and 2019, according to a United Nations report released on Thursday.】

item.title: 星座品牌公司警告啤酒销量承压，因拉美裔消费者减少消费
item.description: 星座品牌公司高管周四表示，由于经济不确定性持续存在，以及核心客户群拉美裔消费者失业率居高不下，啤酒销售可能继续面临波动和压力，这些因素持续抑制着消费支出。【原文：Constellation Brands executives said on Thursday beer sales could remain volatile and under pressure as economic uncertainty and high unemployment among Hispanic consumers, its core customer base, continue to weigh on spending.】

item.title: 高通将为大众汽车新平台提供车载信息娱乐技术
item.description: 大众汽车计划与美国芯片设计公司高通达成长期供货协议，为这家德国汽车制造商的新软件平台提供车载娱乐信息技术。【原文：Volkswagen plans a long-term supply deal with U.S. chip designer Qualcomm to deliver infotainment technology for the German carmaker's new software platform.】

item.title: 特朗普将在未来一两个月内决定房利美和房地美上市事宜，联邦住房金融局局长普尔特向CNBC透露。
item.description: 美国联邦住房金融局局长威廉·普尔特周四表示，他预计特朗普总统将在未来一两个月内决定是否通过首次公开募股（IPO）出售美国房利美和房地美部分股权。【原文：U.S. Federal Housing Finance Agency Director William Pulte said on Thursday he expects President Donald Trump will make a decision in the next month or two on whether to sell a piece of the U.S. mortgage agencies Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 独家：四位消息人士称，维托尔公司已获得美国初步许可，可就委内瑞拉石油进出口事宜展开谈判
item.description: 四位消息人士周四透露，全球最大大宗商品贸易商之一维托尔公司已获得美国政府颁发的初步特别许可，可就未来18个月从委内瑞拉进出口石油展开谈判。【原文：Vitol, one of the world's largest commodity traders, has received a preliminary special license from the U.S. government to begin negotiations to import and export oil from Venezuela for 18 months, four sources said on Thursday.】

item.title: 萨克斯百货摇摇欲坠，百货公司押注购物体验
item.description: 从巴黎到纽约，各大百货公司正着力打造精心策划的购物体验——包括冰上表演、品酒会和建筑导览——以期重新吸引顾客。【原文：From Paris to New York, department stores are sharpening their focus on curated shopping experiences - ice-skating shows, wine tasting and architectural tours - to try to win back shoppers.】

item.title: 纽约联储报告称，12月美国消费者对就业市场担忧加剧
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周三发布的报告显示，尽管对个人财务状况的担忧有所缓解，但美国民众在12月对就业市场的忧虑加剧，同时短期通胀预期有所上升。【原文：Americans grew more worried about the job market in December even as anxieties over personal finances faded, while near-term inflation expectations increased, a report from the New York Federal Reserve showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称，中国安踏体育已提出收购皮诺家族持有的彪马29%股权
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国安踏体育已提出收购法国皮诺家族持有的德国运动品牌彪马29%股权，该德国运动服饰企业目前经营陷入困境。【原文：China's Anta Sports Products has offered to buy 29% of struggling German sportswear firm Puma from France's Pinault family, three people with knowledge of the talks said.】

item.title: 美国10月批发库存进一步增加
item.description: 美国批发库存10月再度增长，这表明在连续两个季度拖累经济增长后，库存可能在第四季度为国内生产总值贡献正向影响。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories increased again in October, suggesting inventories could add to gross domestic product in the fourth quarter after being a drag for two straight quarters.】

item.title: 以色列亚基亚航空与捷蓝航空达成美国境内航班衔接协议
item.description: 以色列阿基亚航空公司周四宣布，已与美国低成本航空公司捷蓝航空达成协议，允许其乘客在美国境内以及前往拉丁美洲和加勒比地区的航线上转乘捷蓝航班。【原文：Israel's Arkia Airlines said on Thursday it signed a deal with low-cost U.S. carrier JetBlue Airways that would allow its customers to connect on JetBlue flights in the United States and to Latin America and the Caribbean.】

item.title: 中国人工智能初创企业MiniMax集团在香港IPO募资6.19亿美元
item.description: 中国人工智能初创企业MiniMax集团周四宣布，其香港首次公开募股最终定价为每股165港元，募集资金48.2亿港元（约合6.186亿美元）。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup MiniMax Group said on Thursday it has set the final offer price for its Hong Kong initial public offering at HK$165 per share, raising HK$4.82 billion ($618.60 million).】

item.title: 霍金路伟任命米兰诉讼业务新合伙人
item.description: 霍金路伟宣布，随着该律所全球范围内任命28名新合伙人和53名新顾问，其米兰诉讼部门的亚历山德罗·博雷洛已晋升为合伙人。【原文：Hogan Lovells said it had promoted Alessandro Borrello as partner in its litigation department in Milan as the law firm named 28 new partners and 53 new counsels globally.】

item.title: 法国国防部授予Mistral AI框架协议
item.description: 法国国防部周四宣布，已与人工智能公司Mistral AI签订框架协议。【原文：France's Ministry of the Armed Forces has awarded a framework agreement to artificial intelligence company Mistral AI, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国10月贸易赤字降至2009年以来最低水平，因进口减少
item.description: 美国10月贸易逆差大幅收窄，降至2009年中期以来的最低水平，主要因进口减少。若这一趋势得以延续，贸易有望在第四季度再次为经济增长作出贡献。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit contracted sharply in October, hitting the lowest level since mid-2009 as imports declined, a trend that if sustained could see trade again adding to economic growth in the fourth quarter.】
